text: Gnomeo & Juliet is a 2011 British-American 3D computer-animated fantasy romantic comedy movie loosely based on William Shakespeare's play Romeo and Juliet and an original screenplay by John R. Smith and Rob Sprackling. The movie had funding from Disney and released through its Touchstone Pictures banner. It was co-written and directed by Kelly Asbury and starring the voices of James McAvoy, Emily Blunt, Michael Caine, Jason Statham, Maggie Smith, Patrick Stewart, Jim Cummings, Ashley Jensen, Stephen Merchant, Matt Lucas, and Ozzy Osbourne. The movie premiered at the El Capitan Theatre in Hollywood on January 23, 2011. It was theatrically released in the United Kingdom and United States on February 11, 2011. ==References== Category:2011 romantic comedy movies Category:2011 fantasy movies Category:2011 animated movies Category:British romantic comedy movies Category:British fantasy movies Category:British animated movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:2010s American fantasy movies Category:American animated movies Category:Movies directed by Kelly Asbury
title: Gnomeo & Juliet
